News & Announcements

  1. Kletzsch Park Dam Upgrades

    The City of Glendale Staff continues to meet with Milwaukee County and Wisconsin DNR staff to look at various options for the Kletzsch Park Dam Upgrades. Read on...

  2. Brush and Yard Waste Collection

    Your brush and yard waste needs to be out by 7 a.m. on the day of your normal garbage collection. To determine your collection week, please refer to the brush and yard waste calendar. Read on...

  3. Property Maintenance

    Many residents do a great job keeping up the appearance of their homes and properties. At times there are some properties located in Glendale that have seen better days. Read on...

  4. 2019 Spring Newsletter

    The 2019 Spring Newsletter is now available. Additional Info...
